snippet: The Directors Guild of America on Monday announced its feature nominees, which, in addition to Woody Allen, Martin Scorsese and David Fincher, included Michel Hazanavicius and Alexander Payne.
abstract: The Directors Guild of America on Monday announced its feature nominees, which, in addition to Woody Allen, Martin Scorsese and David Fincher, included Michel Hazanavicius and Alexander Payne.

headline.main: Directors Guild Nominees Include Allen, Scorsese and Fincher
